products.title: Santa Fe Soft White (Gloss)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Santa Fe Soft White (Gloss) Wooden Venetian Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Wooden Venetian Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Min Width: 305mm Max Width: 2896mm
 	Min Drop: 305mm Max Drop: 3500mm
 	Slat Composition: Basswood
 	Slat Widths Available: 50mm
 	Guarantee: 12 Months
 	Controls: A choice of Standard Controls (left hand tilt / right hand raise &amp; lower), Left Hand Controls (left hand tilt / left hand raise &amp; lower) or Right Hand Controls (right hand tilt / right hand raise &amp; lower).
 	Styling: Co-ordinating cords as standard, tapes optional. Stained slat ends.
 	Pelmet: Co-ordinating pelmet
 	Headrail: Robust aluminium headrail 51mm wide x 57mm deep.

products.title: Whitewood
products.metadescription: Whitewood Woodline 9410 Wood Effect Metal Venetian Blind

products.title: Pure White Real Wood
products.metadescription: The Pure White Sunwood Blinds offer a sheer elegance, due to their natural beauty.
products.productdescription: Our premium quality Sunwood range of Blinds are one of the leading Wooden Venetian Blind brands in the UK market - we are confident you will not buy better quality blinds, backed by our 3 Year Guarantee. All blinds are sent with installation instructions, universal bracket (top fix, side fix or face fix) and a Pelmet fascia to sit on the front of the blind headrail.

products.title: Lifetime Smooth White
products.metadescription: The perfectly natural Faux Wood Collection offers a waterproof and modern venetian blind, child safe and made to measure. Manufactured in the UK.
products.productdescription: Lifetime Smooth White will bring a fresh, modern feel to any room. Reflecting all the light into the room when open, this will give the perfect finish to the contemporary room you've created! Our outstanding quality Lifetime Blinds are made to the same high standards as all our other Venetian Blinds - we are confident you will not buy better quality blinds, backed by our 3 Year Guarantee. All blinds are sent with installation instructions, universal bracket (top fix, side fix or face fox) and a Pelmet fascia to sit on the front of the blind headrail.

products.title: Lifetime Smooth Brilliant White
products.metadescription: The perfectly natural Faux Wood Collection offers a waterproof and durable venetian blind. With a luxurious, plain or wood effect textured finish in claming tones, the Faux Wood Collection is simply perfect for any room, especially bathrooms.
products.productdescription: Lifetime Smooth Brilliant White will bring a fresh, modern feel to any room. Reflecting all the light into the room when open, this will give the perfect finish to the contemporary room you've created! Our outstanding quality Lifetime Blinds are made to the same high standards as all our other Venetian Blinds - we are confident you will not buy better quality blinds, backed by our 3 Year Guarantee. All blinds are sent with installation instructions, universal bracket (top fix, side fix or face fix) and a Pelmet fascia to sit on the front of the blind headrail

products.title: Gloss Pure White Real Wood
products.metadescription: With a contemporary White Glossy finish, the Gloss Collection gives an edge of high drama and sophistication. With a trend-led designer finish.
products.productdescription: Our premium quality Sunwood range of Blinds are one of the leading Wooden Venetian Blind brands in the UK market - we are confident you will not buy better quality blinds, backed by our 3 Year Guarantee. All blinds are sent with installation instructions, universal bracket (top fix, side fix or face fix) and a Pelmet fascia to sit on the front of the blind headrail.
